util.service

Class ServiceConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.service.ServiceConnector

  • public final class ServiceConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    ServiceConnector makes it easy to connect to remote android aidl services. It manages the process of dealing with ServiceConnection leaving you to simply focus on what to do with the service objects

    To use a ServiceConnector,

    1. Declare the remote IInterface as instance fields, and annotate it with @ServiceInfo ex: 
      
   @ServiceInfo(serviceIntent="com.myintent.MY_SERVICE")
   private IMYService myService;
    2. (Optional) If you want to know when the service is connected/disconnected, add callback methods and annotate them with @ServiceConnectionCallback 
      
   @ServiceConnectionCallback
  public void onServiceConnectionChanged(String serviceIntent, boolean connected) {
  }
 
    3. 
 Call bind(Object, Context)
    See Also:
    ServiceConnector

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        public static void bind(java.lang.Object target,
                        Context context)
        Call this to process the given target object to look for any IInterface fields annotated with ServiceInfo, and if so connects to those services. Those fields will get initialized with the remote IInterface service objects when the service is successfully connected.
        Parameters:
        target - The object to analyze
        context - Context used to connect to service

      • unbind

        public static void unbind(java.lang.Object target)
        Disconnects from all the services bounded to this target. Any services that are no more bounded to any other targets will be disconnected.
        Parameters:
        target - The target used to bind.

      • isAllConnected

        public static boolean isAllConnected()
        Returns true if all the annotated services are connected.
        Returns:
        if all services are connected

      • isConnected

        public static boolean isConnected(java.lang.String serviceIntent)
        Returns true if connected with a service of the given intent.
        Parameters:
        serviceIntent - The intent of service to check for

      • waitForConnected

        public static void waitForConnected(long timeout,
                                    java.lang.String serviceIntent)
                             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Blocks for up to the given timeout for the connection to the given service.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Maximum timeout in ms to wait for. 0 Waits until service is connected
        serviceIntent - The service intent
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • waitForAllConnected

        public static void waitForAllConnected(long timeout)
                                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Blocks for up to the given timeout for the connection with all the services
        Parameters:
        timeout - Maximum timeout in ms to wait for. 0 Waits until service is connected
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • setEnableDebug

        public static void setEnableDebug(boolean enableDebug)
        Call to enable or disable debug logs
        Parameters:
        enableDebug - Enable or disable
